name: Tesco 2 Breaded Chicken Breast Fillets 350G
description: Chicken breast fillets in a crispy breadcrumb coating

For stress free school night teatimes rustle up our 100% chicken breast fillets in a light, crispy crumb. Easy to prepare and perfect with salad or seasonal veg, and for building burgers, they are a hit with kids and a must have for speedy midweek meals. For a fun diner style dinner serve your chicken fillets in crusty rolls with lettuce, tomato and cool mayonnaise. Instead of chunky chips why not try our Real Food recipe: Sweet potato fries and a crisp salad.
